thread.title: Let’s talk: Lewis Hamilton on Austin, F1 in the U.S and pancakes
thread.title_full: Let’s talk: Lewis Hamilton on Austin, F1 in the U.S and pancakes | www.statesman.com

author: Sean Shapiro
title: Let’s talk: Lewis Hamilton on Austin, F1 in the U.S and pancakes
text:
Reigning Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton, who’s here for the U.S. Grand Prix this weekend at Circuit of the Americas, palled around with four young motor sports fans Wednesday as part of a promotional appearance at K1 Speed. He also took time to answer a few questions.
You’ve already been asked hundreds of questions this week. If you were on the other side, what question would you ask Lewis Hamilton?
